Name: Royal Purple Bottom
Description: A regal bottom bathing suit that increases your endurance by 20 points!

Description: A pair of soft, supple leggings that provide excellent mobility and comfort.

Description: Trousers made from rare amethyst silk, providing excellent protection against physical attacks.

Description: A pair of pants made from high-quality purple fabric, perfect for formal occasions.

Description: Elegant leggings imbued with magical properties, providing excellent protection against magical attacks.

Description: A sturdy armor that protects the wearer from mortal wounds.
